original_text: Your wives, your little ones, and your livestock shall remain in the land that Moses gave you beyond the Jordan, but all the men of valor among you shall pass over armed before your brothers and shall help them,
korean_text: 너희의 처자와 가축은 모세가 너희에게 준 요단 이쪽 땅에 머무르려니와 너희 모든 용사들은 무장하고 너희의 형제보다 앞서 건너가서 그들을 돕되

sentences.original_text: Your wives, your little ones, and your livestock
that Moses gave you beyond the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 모세가 요단 강 건너편에서 너희에게 준

sentences.original_text: but all the men of valor among you
shall pass over armed before your brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 무장을 하고 너희 형제들 앞에서 건너가야 하며
